channel.title: [Renamed] BoB interface
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I'm working on a custom PI Summoning skill, but I can't get the BoB interface to work. I got the sprites etc. loaded, but I can't get the following things to work:
- Change the inventory to Store 1/5/10/X/All - Show the actual items in the BoB. I can't figure how to let the system know what coords are where all items should be located.
Sorry if this is nooby guys, I'm not much of a client guy, mainly server.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: [Renamed] BoB interface
item.dc:creator: @purepout purepout
item.description:
@purepout wrote:

I don’t think most of this is serversided. Specifying what items should be in the BoB is server side yes, and not really a problem but how to make them appear in the BoB is.

Read full topic

item.title: [Renamed] BoB interface
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

I believe this is server sided. If you help me add the interface I’ll help you add BoB.

Read full topic
